filmography.title: Port of New York
filmography.role_description: A suave, ruthless narcotics smuggler who uses a yacht club as a front for his operations; Brynner's film debut.
filmography.plot: Two federal agents go undercover to track down a gang of drug smugglers operating out of the New York harbor.

filmography.title: The King and I
filmography.role_description: The stubborn, authoritative, yet modernizing King of Siam who clashes with and learns from a British schoolteacher.
filmography.plot: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children, leading to a clash of wills and culture.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actor; National Board of Review: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: The Ten Commandments
filmography.role_description: The arrogant and powerful Pharaoh of Egypt who refuses to free the Hebrew slaves, serving as Moses' antagonist.
filmography.plot: Moses discovers his Hebrew heritage and leads his people out of Egypt, facing the wrath of Pharaoh Rameses.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: Anastasia
filmography.role_description: A calculating Russian exile who grooms a suicidal amnesiac to pose as the Grand Duchess Anastasia to claim an inheritance.
filmography.plot: An opportunistic Russian businessman tries to pass a mysterious impostor as the Grand Duchess Anastasia.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: The Brothers Karamazov
filmography.role_description: The eldest, passionate, and impulsive brother who squanders his money and fights with his father over a woman.
filmography.plot: The lives of four brothers are forever changed by their father's murder and the conflicts over money and love.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Nomination – Palme d'Or

filmography.title: The Buccaneer
filmography.role_description: The dashing pirate who aids General Andrew Jackson in the Battle of New Orleans during the War of 1812.
filmography.plot: Pirate Jean Lafitte falls in love with a Governor's daughter and helps the Americans fight the British.

filmography.title: The Journey
filmography.role_description: A conflicted Soviet officer during the Hungarian Revolution who detains a group of travelers, falling for an Englishwoman.
filmography.plot: A group of Westerners tries to escape Hungary after the Soviet invasion of 1956, but are held up by a Russian major.

filmography.title: Solomon and Sheba
filmography.role_description: The wise King of Israel who falls in love with the Queen of Sheba, threatening his kingdom's stability.
filmography.plot: Before he dies, King David names his younger son Solomon as his heir, leading to conflict with his other son and a romance with the Queen of Sheba.

filmography.title: Once More, with Feeling!
filmography.role_description: A tyrannical and egotistical symphony conductor whose wife decides she wants to leave him.
filmography.plot: A conductor's wife decides to divorce him, but he tries to win her back to save his career and his heart.

filmography.title: The Magnificent Seven
filmography.role_description: A Cajun gunslinger who leads a group of seven mercenaries hired to protect a Mexican village from bandits.
filmography.plot: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

filmography.title: Taras Bulba
filmography.role_description: A fierce Cossack leader who fights to regain his land from the Polish army, facing tragedy within his own family.
filmography.plot: A powerful Cossack leader fights for control of the steppes but faces a crisis when his son falls in love with a Polish noblewoman.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Original Score

filmography.title: Escape from Zahrain
filmography.role_description: A revolutionary Arab nationalist leader who escapes a prison convoy and flees across the desert.
filmography.plot: A rebel leader escapes from a police van in a Middle Eastern country and makes a dash for the border with a diverse group of fugitives.

filmography.title: Kings of the Sun
filmography.role_description: A Native American chief who initially clashes with but later befriends a Mayan king fleeing persecution.
filmography.plot: A Mayan tribe flees to North America and encounters a Native American tribe, leading to conflict and eventually alliance.

filmography.title: Flight from Ashiya
filmography.role_description: A Japanese-American para-rescue jumper serving in the US Air Force, haunted by a tragic past memory.
filmography.plot: The stories of three US Air Force Air Rescue Service crew members unfold as they attempt to rescue survivors of a shipwreck.

filmography.title: Invitation to a Gunfighter
filmography.role_description: A sophisticated, educated Creole gunfighter who is hired by a town to kill a local outcast but turns the tables on his employers.
filmography.plot: A town hires a professional killer to stop a Confederate vet from reclaiming his property, but the gunfighter takes over the town instead.

filmography.title: Morituri
filmography.role_description: A German merchant marine captain transporting rubber who is opposed to the Nazi regime but dedicated to his ship.
filmography.plot: A German pacifist is blackmailed by British intelligence into impersonating an SS officer on a blockade runner ship.

filmography.title: Cast a Giant Shadow
filmography.role_description: A Jewish Haganah commander who clashes with Kirk Douglas's character over strategy in the 1948 Arab-Israeli War.
filmography.plot: An American Army officer is recruited by the yet-to-exist Israel to help them form an army.

filmography.title: Return of the Seven
filmography.role_description: Reprising his role as the leader of the gunmen, Chris Adams rounds up a new group to rescue a friend from a Mexican prison.
filmography.plot: The leader of the Magnificent Seven is recruited to rescue one of his former comrades who has been kidnapped by a wealthy rancher.

filmography.title: Triple Cross
filmography.role_description: A German intelligence officer who handles the double agent Eddie Chapman during WWII.
filmography.plot: The true story of Eddie Chapman, a British bank robber who became a double agent for the British during World War II.

filmography.title: The Long Duel
filmography.role_description: The leader of a nomadic Indian tribe who fights a noble battle against British colonial police.
filmography.plot: A British police officer in 1920s India tries to settle a conflict with a tribe led by a noble Sultan without violence.

filmography.title: Villa Rides
filmography.role_description: The famous Mexican revolutionary leader who battles government forces with the help of an American aviator.
filmography.plot: An American pilot becomes involved with Pancho Villa and the Mexican Revolution.

filmography.title: The Madwoman of Chaillot
filmography.role_description: A greedy capitalist plotting to drill for oil under the streets of Paris.
filmography.plot: A countess uncovers a plot to drill for oil in Paris and sets up a trial to judge the conspirators.

filmography.title: Battle of Neretva
filmography.role_description: A partisan commander in this massive Yugoslavian production about a crucial WWII battle.
filmography.plot: Partisans in Yugoslavia fight a massive battle against Axis powers to save thousands of refugees.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Foreign Language Film

filmography.title: Adios, Sabata
filmography.role_description: A black-clad gunslinger and mercenary in Mexico who helps revolutionaries steal gold from the Austrian occupiers.
filmography.plot: A mercenary arrives in Mexico to steal a shipment of gold from the Austrian occupiers during the rule of Emperor Maximilian.

filmography.title: The Light at the Edge of the World
filmography.role_description: A charismatic but ruthless pirate captain who takes over a lighthouse island at Cape Horn.
filmography.plot: Pirates take over a lighthouse on a rocky island, and the lone surviving lighthouse keeper must fight them off.

filmography.title: Westworld
filmography.role_description: A relentless android cowboy in a futuristic theme park who malfunctions and begins hunting down guests.
filmography.plot: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

filmography.title: The Ultimate Warrior
filmography.role_description: A street fighter hired to protect a community of survivors in a post-apocalyptic New York City.
filmography.plot: In a post-apocalyptic future, a fighter is hired to protect a commune's precious seeds and pregnant woman from street gangs.
